definition: Sarajevo, capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: In 1997, Budde was made Commander of the Multinational Brigade Centre in Sarajevo.
sentences.chinese: 1997年他成爲薩拉熱窩多國旅中心的指揮官。

sentences.english: A city of northwest-central Yugoslavia northwest of Sarajevo.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫中部偏西北一城市，位於薩拉熱窩西北。

sentences.english: The capital of the country is Sarajevo, which is also its largest city.
sentences.chinese: 國家的首都是薩拉熱窩，它也是該國最大的城市。

sentences.english: He has also visited Moscow and Sarajevo on behalf of Unicef.
sentences.chinese: 他還曾代表兒基會訪問莫斯科和薩拉熱窩。
